video.title: PopPixie
video.synopsis: Protected and empowered by the magical Tree of Life, the miniature metropolis of Pixieville is home to a group of extraordinary little creatures.

episodes.synopsis: Pam is worried because she still hasn't found her talent. Meanwhile, a carnivorous plant invades Pixieville, and the Pixies' MagicPops no longer work.
episodes.title: Green Attack

episodes.synopsis: Ranger Robinson invites Amore to go for a romantic swim in Lake Rainbow. Enthusiastic, she accepts without revealing that she can't swim!
episodes.title: A Pixie Fish

episodes.synopsis: A new Pixie arrives in Pixieville. Cherie, however, is not an ordinary Pixie: she's rich, spoiled, and most of all, moody.
episodes.title: Crazy Weather

episodes.synopsis: Lockette's parents are visiting! Lockette wants to make a good impression on them, so she pretends to be the most famous confectioner in Pixieville.
episodes.title: Lockette's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Trying to become a journalist at the Pixieville Chronicle, Chatta finds a scoop: Pixies are being hypnotized to bring their valuables to thieves.
episodes.title: Flying Money

episodes.synopsis: Pixieville is storming the Molly Moo to cool down with ice cream. Caramel uses her magic to create an ice cream tree that satisfies all the requests.
episodes.title: Caramel's Ice Cream Tree

episodes.synopsis: The female Elf, Maxine, manages to persuade Morpho to exchange her own appearance for Lockette's, so that she'll be able to rob the Pixie Plaza.
episodes.title: The Mirror Spell

episodes.synopsis: Excited about interviewing her music idol, Quentin Quake, Chatta tries to seduce the handsome pop star by buying a magic perfume from the Love Shop.
episodes.title: The Big Interview

episodes.synopsis: For Chatta's birthday, Fixit builds a Pixiebot, a robot programmed to do whatever Chatta orders. But the Elves try to ruin the party, as usual.
episodes.title: A Robot for Chatta

episodes.synopsis: Chatta and Amore have won a stay at the Pixie Plaza. Their demands and the disappearance of a famous explorer's bag strains Lockette to the limit.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Lost Magicpop

episodes.synopsis: Amore persuades Lockette to take part in a survival course at Camp Pixie in order to be near Ranger Robinson, who's organizing the course.
episodes.title: Let's Go Camp Pixie

episodes.synopsis: Chatta's favorite singer, Justin Nimble, is singing at a charity concert to benefit the bumble monkeys. To draw Justin's attention, Chatta adopts one.
episodes.title: Save the Bumble Monkey's

episodes.synopsis: Plasto, Martino's best friend, tries to find a job, but the Elves trick him into becoming an accomplice in a bank robbery!
episodes.title: My Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Otis accidentally creates a potion that causes all of Pixieville to fall in love with the Elves -- who are quick to take advantage of the situation.
episodes.title: Amore's Love Potion

episodes.synopsis: Fixit realizes that a toy prototype that he built for Augustus's shop is dangerous. In order to avoid damage, Fixit tries to deactivate it.
episodes.title: Super Toy

episodes.synopsis: During the annual Technomagic contest between Fixit and Digit, a powerful virus corrupts the city's Technomagic stations, causing widespread chaos.
episodes.title: Techno Magicpop

episodes.synopsis: Two Elves take their unbearable son to Tune's school so she can keep an eye on him for a few hours.
episodes.title: An Elf in School

episodes.synopsis: The Gnomes have gone mad and are treating the Pixies poorly. Upon request of the Pixieville Chronicle's editor, Chatta carries out an investigation.
episodes.title: Gnomes Gone Mad

episodes.synopsis: Only Amore, the broken hearts specialist, will be able to help two separated Elves make up, but first she has to understand the Elves' real nature.
episodes.title: Lenny and Yucca at War

episodes.synopsis: All of Pixieville is getting ready for the Yearly Yodel Festival! Tune has a terrific chance to win the trophy, but she catches a bad cough.
episodes.title: The Silent Curse

episodes.synopsis: Piff infects the entire school bus with her yawns, and soon the bus driver gets lost in Pixieville's forest. Luckily, the Pixies are very resourceful.
episodes.title: The School-Bus Heroes

episodes.synopsis: A gang rages through Pixieville and steals the MagicPops. To compensate, the Gnomes buy new MagicPops at a high price from a mysterious dealer.
episodes.title: I'm a PopPixie Too

episodes.synopsis: When Guzman gets fired, he starts searching for a new job. But fate doesn't smile on him -- until the monkey finds a brush and some magic paints.
episodes.title: You're Fired!

episodes.synopsis: An evil mushroom cloud messes up the citizens' hair, and Pam's beauty center is forced to close down. Meanwhile, a new beauty shop opens in town.
episodes.title: Bad Hair Day

episodes.synopsis: When Caramel gets amnesia and the Molly Moo is left in the hands of her clumsy assistant, the Pixie friends try to help Caramel regain her memory.
episodes.title: Martino's Special Talent

episodes.synopsis: The barrier is weak because the Elves aren’t cleaning their neighborhood. When the Pixies try to spruce up, the Elves send two spiders to fight back.
episodes.title: Giant Spiders Invasion

episodes.synopsis: The Gnomes' traditional gold rush is about to start in Pixieville. However, all the Gnomes have mysteriously disappeared from the city.
episodes.title: The Gnomes' Gold Rush

episodes.synopsis: Cherie goes to her ex-boyfriend Arsenio's engagement party with Martino and Amore. But Arsenio's new girlfriend seems to be hiding something.
episodes.title: The Perfect Party

episodes.synopsis: Lockette's cousin Giga, who is able to grow bigger and smaller, finds a long-tongued chameleon in the forest that has the same talent!
episodes.title: A Funny Pet

episodes.synopsis: Lockette decides to participate in the Pixieville Grand Prix and, thanks to her Pixie friends, the Pixie Plaza's van is turned into a race car.
episodes.title: The Pixieville Grand Prix

episodes.synopsis: Cherie wants to compete in the Pixieville talent show, so her friends -- who think Cherie has no chance of winning -- sign up to lose voluntarily.
episodes.title: A Stormy Talent Show

episodes.synopsis: Jolly, who organizes parties, brings the singing Pudgypigeons to Pixieville for a show. Yet the ravenous birds turn the city upside down!
episodes.title: Jolly's Crackling Exhibition

episodes.synopsis: Amore, Otis and Wiki journey to recover the famous Lost Ladle of the Cave Gnomes, but two dragons are also searching for the artifact.
episodes.title: Amore and the Quarrelling Dragons

episodes.synopsis: Chatta has a new admirer: Zepto, a very persistent Elf! The Pixie can't stand him or his presents, so she asks her friends to help get rid of him.
episodes.title: Chatta's Biggest Fan

episodes.synopsis: A talisman that can turn all the Gnomes into stone falls down from the sky. The object winds up with the Elves, who petrify the Gnomes to rob them.
episodes.title: The Last Gnome

episodes.synopsis: Rex and his gang of Elves plot to use ravenous molesaurs to reach a bank vault. But the scheme causes many sinkholes throughout Pixieville!
episodes.title: The Elves' Underground Assault

episodes.synopsis: Sinia, a female Elf, can appear as a very beautiful Pixie thanks to the MagicPops' dust, and is constantly stealing MagicPops to reiterate the spell.
episodes.title: Magicpops in Danger

episodes.synopsis: The Elves make Pixieville's power station go crazy, sending the fun park haywire. Glim, who has a strong electrical charge, tries to fix the problem.
episodes.title: An Electrifying Day

episodes.synopsis: The Elves have taken the Wish Mirror! When their wishes wreak havoc on Pixieville, will the Pixies be able to break the mirror's spells?
episodes.title: Three Amazing Wishes

episodes.synopsis: The Elves cast a spell that miniaturizes the Pixies, the Gnomes and the Animals. The Pixies, because of their new size, can't use their MagicPops.
episodes.title: The Lilliputian Pixies

episodes.synopsis: Chatta awakens a creature that speaks non-stop -- and if it doesn't get an answer to its rambling questions, it destroys whatever is in its path!
episodes.title: Chatta's Chatting Rival

episodes.synopsis: Scorned by Pam, Lockette and Chatta because of her slowness, Nappa, the queen of snails, casts a curse on the three Pixies.
episodes.title: Hurry Up, Pam

episodes.synopsis: Caramel has to bake a sugar pumpkin cake. Instead of going to Camilla's garden center, Martino picks a pumpkin in the woods, grown on cursed land.
episodes.title: Bad-Luck Ladybug

episodes.synopsis: The Pixies are having a picnic at the lake. Martino and Fixit challenge each other to a diving contest, but the water is chilly and they catch a cold!
episodes.title: Fixit and Martino's Bad Cold!

episodes.synopsis: Pixieville's dentist casts a spell on Caramel's new recipe, transforming Caramel, Cherie, Chatta, Lockette and Amore into sugar-hungry monsters.
episodes.title: Caramel's Sugary Cupcakes

episodes.synopsis: Rich and spoiled Cherie is forced to work at the Pixie Plaza's reception desk -- while Lockette lives in the lap of luxury, with Lulù at her service.
episodes.title: Living Like Cherie

episodes.synopsis: The twins Caramel and Martino argue to the point of going their separate ways, each trying to duplicate the success of the Molly Moo on their own.
episodes.title: A Competition Between Caramel and Martino

episodes.synopsis: During a lake trip, the Pixies are sucked into a vortex and taken to an underwater world, where the Mermaids are threatened by a fierce creature.
episodes.title: Mermaids, PopPixies' Best Friends!

episodes.synopsis: A rainbow appears in Pixieville, sending energy to the Tree of Life. But the Pixies have to stop the Gnomes and the Elves from finding its treasure.
episodes.title: A Treasure Under the Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: The Elves steal Chatta's shell-phone and ambush mermaid Li-Ban so they can create a potion that will turn all Pixieville citizens into sea creatures.
episodes.title: The Mermaid's Potion

episodes.synopsis: A molesaur puppy has gnawed the Tree of Life's roots, causing the city's barrier to disappear. A gang of Elves takes advantage of the terrible event.
episodes.title: Rex's Threat on Pixieville

episodes.synopsis: After conquering Pixieville thanks to the Command Stick and the creatures controlled by its power, Rex's gang threatens to destroy the Tree of Life.
episodes.title: Saving the Tree of Life
